title: Square Root Calculator
description: Calculate the square root of any number. Find the square root of positive numbers with precision.

inputs.name: number
inputs.label: Number
inputs.helpText: Enter a positive number to find its square root

variables.number: The number to find the square root of

howTo: Enter a positive number in the input field
Click "Calculate" to compute the square root
The result shows the square root of the entered number
For negative numbers, the result will be NaN (Not a Number)

examples.title: Example 3: Square root of 2
examples.description: Calculate the square root of 2 (irrational number)

faq.question: What is a square root?
faq.answer: A square root of a number is a value that, when multiplied by itself, gives the original number. For example, the square root of 16 is 4 because 4 × 4 = 16.

faq.question: Can I calculate the square root of negative numbers?
faq.answer: No, the square root of a negative number is not a real number. In mathematics, this is represented as an imaginary number, but this calculator only works with real numbers (non-negative values).

faq.question: What is the square root of 0?
faq.answer: The square root of 0 is 0, because 0 × 0 = 0.

faq.question: How accurate are the results?
faq.answer: The calculator uses JavaScript's Math.sqrt() function, which provides high precision results for most practical purposes.
